definition: eddying/whirling (of water)/to go against the current

sentences.english: Takifugu obscurus, popularly named obscure puffer, is a fish of river to sea migration.
sentences.chinese: 暗紋東方魚屯俗稱河豚，屬江海洄游性魚類。

sentences.english: The Chinese sturgeon is a typical migration fish between the river and the sea with a special behavior.
sentences.chinese: 中華鱘是典型的海河洄游性魚類，其生活習性獨特。

sentences.english: Lamprey is a typical migratory fish, some time in the sea of life.
sentences.chinese: 鰻是一個典型的洄游魚類，一些在海上的生活時間。

sentences.english: The marginal region of the YSCWM seems to be the main wintering migration route of anchovy.
sentences.chinese: 冷水團邊緣應是鯷魚越冬洄游的主要路徑。

sentences.english: For fish that have evolved to migrate and breed along a free-flowing river, large reservoirs can be a death sentence.
sentences.chinese: 大型水庫對於洄游性魚類而言可能就是死刑。

sentences.english: This is the season when fish migrate.
sentences.chinese: 這個季節正是魚洄游的時候。

definition: see 大馬哈魚|大马哈鱼[da4 ma3 ha3 yu2]
to fish for (aquatic animals and plants)/to catch
to prey on/to catch and feed on/to hunt for food
variant of 漁汛|渔汛[yu2 xun4]
